mapper.select: select count(0) from course_student LEFT JOIN course_teacher on course_student.course_id = course_teacher.id where course_teacher.id = #{courseId} and course_student.delete_status = '1'

select sys_user.nickname,sys_user.nickname_cn,course_student.is_pay,course_student.course_date from course_student LEFT JOIN course_teacher on course_student.course_id = course_teacher.id LEFT JOIN sys_user on sys_user.id=course_student.select_user_id where course_teacher.id = #{courseId} and course_student.delete_status = '1' order by course_student.update_date asc
